modName: Lesser Tribes Men in the Rift
summary: This mod is a small addon for LC_BecomeJarlofIvarstead that reduces the Redskulls  that patrol the rift
descriptionHtml:
Lesser Tribes Men in the Rift Is an addon for LC_BecomeJarlofIvarstead..

Like many others that liked [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51633/?] Locaster - Become Jarl of Iverstead [/url] we know that one of the most annoying parts of the mod was the number of RedSkull Tribes men you see around Riften. The aim of the mod is to lessen the number of RedSkulls spawned so you can prance around The rift with your horse and not get swarmed by a huge mob of tribes men with anger management issues.

You will still encounter them like before but now they are in groups of 2-3 people instead of 4-6.

This mod was designed by my brother to his liking.. the only spawns touched were the scattered mobs making the mobs you fight during quests unchanged..

we accept feedback just in case we missed some or you want us to adjust something ..


[b][u]Installation[/b][/u]
Just drop it in your data folder or install it via NMM
and
make sure its checked under plugins

Make it a custom to backup your save before installing new mods.. as far as we know It works for our game but we don't know the side effects on yours...

[b][u]Be aware that this is only an addon and will still require the main mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51633/?] Locaster - Become Jarl of Iverstead [/url] [/b][/u]


[b][u]Load Order[/u][/b]
For this I use "LOOT", but in case you use "BOSS" or manually arrange plugins just put it right below LC_BecomeJarlofIvarstead.esp


[b][u]Uninstall[/u][/b]
Just delete it from folder or deactivate via NMM

[b][u]Conflicts [/b][/u]
None that i Know of

[b][u]Credits[/b][/u]

Thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51633/?] Locaster - Become Jarl of Iverstead [/url]
Really loved the mod..
author: TheBlueShark
